metadata.title: CVE-2019-19055 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** A memory leak in the nl80211_get_ftm_responder_stats()function in net/wireless/nl80211.c in the Linux kernel through 5.3.11allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) bytriggering nl80211hdr_put() failures, aka CID-1399c59fa929. NOTE: thirdparties dispute the relevance of this because it occurs on a code pathwhere a successful allocation has already occurred.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
